title: The works of John Knox;
author: Knox, John
snippet: In December 1564, he is styled " Arthur Erskine of Blackgrange, brother-german to John Lord Erskine." (Register of Signa tures.) He was probably the ancestor of the Erskines of Scotscraig in Fife, who flourished in the following century. 8 In MS. A, the marginal note is thus inserted in the text, " ance or twice since this was Balfoures rule."
